Text: The Magic Window:  With a run of 43 years, it was the longest running children's television program in American history.

Text: The Magic Window:  Producer Dick Hartzell and WOI TV artist Joy (Ringham) Munn developed the show as an educational children's program, which featured handicraft activities, news items, and birthday recognition for the children viewing the show.
